resources.string: ရွာေဖြမည္။
ရွာေဖြမည္။
Continuous tapping (not long press), finger does not need to leave the surface of the touch area

"Anti-false touch is a setting value of whether a tap is triggered when fingers are placed on the touch area.
The higher the anti-false touch is set, the better the anti-false touch effect"
Vibration feedback when AirTriggers are triggered
Display visual feedback during game play

The slide distance refers to the sliding distance on the screen when you slide a certain distance on the touch area. You can adjust the multiplier according to your preference. The higher the multiplier, the longer the slide distance on screen.
The higher the trigger distance is set, the longer the finger needs to slide to trigger the long swipe function.
The higher the trigger speed is set, the faster the finger needs to slide to trigger the swipe function.
